resources.string:
Lights Out is a fun game to test your wits and imagination! It was originally released by Tiger Electronics in 1995. A similar game was released by Vulcan Electronics in 1983 named XL-25.

Developer: Ryan Andrei Cruz
Course: Computer Science
Lab Section: B-6L

The goal of the game to turn all of the boxes dark. Every box that you tap will turn them dark, including the four boxes adjacent to them. Should you exceed 15 taps, you lose. However, resetting the board resets your number of taps too! Good luck and strategize well!
